text: Veldhuizen is a hamlet in the Dutch province of Utrecht. It is located in the municipality of Utrecht, south of De Meern. It is also the name of a new neighbourhood of Utrecht, built close to the hamlet. Veldhuizen was a separate municipality between 1818 and 1954, when it became a part of Vleuten-De Meern. ==References== Category:Populated places in Utrecht (province) Category:Former municipalities of Utrecht (province)
title: Veldhuizen
